summary: This is an email from a staff member (Shivers) to a Warden, transmitting staff schedules for the period from July 22, 2019, to the present date (August 12, 2019). The document appears to be a routine administrative communication regarding staff assignments.

persons.name: Shivers
persons.context: The sender of the email who is providing staff schedules to the Warden as requested by a Captain.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: The recipient of the email who had requested staff schedules.

persons.name: Captain
persons.context: The Captain who originally requested the staff schedules that are being forwarded.

connections.description: Shivers is sending requested information (staff schedules) to the Warden.
The Captain made a request to the Warden for staff schedules.

events.title: Start date for staff schedule period
events.description: The staff schedules being transmitted cover the period starting from July 22, 2019.

events.title: Email transmitting staff schedules
events.description: Shivers sends an email to the Warden with attached staff schedules covering July 22 to present.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 12, 2019, regarding staff schedules.
The schedules cover the period from July 22, 2019, to August 12, 2019.
The communication is between staff members (Shivers, Warden, and a Captain) in what appears to be a correctional or detention facility context.
